text: jo kuchh aasamaanon mein hai aur jo kuchh zameen mein hai (garaz) sab kuchh khuda hee ka hai aur jo kuchh tumhaare dilon mein he khvaah tum usako zaahir karo ya use chhipao khuda tumase usaka hisaab lega, phir jis ko chaahe bakhsh de aur jis par chaahe azaab kare, aur khuda har cheez par qaadir hai
